content: fun **checkered potholder** with a kitsch touch *this pattern is written in us terms* **materials** 3 0 mm 11 uk crochet hook sport 2 fine yarn tapestry needle *optional* lining fabric **yarn** i used schachenmayr catania *137 yds 125 m per 50 g* in the following colors and amounts **w** nature 105 44 yds 40 2 m **b** black 110 44 yds 40 2 m **a** anis 245 5 5 yds 5 m **y** sun 208 1 yds 0 9 m **o** orchid 222 1 yds 0 9 m **t** turquoise 397 1 yds 0 9 m **v** violet 113 1 yds 0 9 m feel free to use any comparable yarn that meets gauge **size** 6 6 16 8 cm by 6 7 17 cm **gauge** 29 half_double_crochet for 19 row in 4 10 cm worked in tapestry crochet using 2 strands of yarn **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni
